template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Jemand hat eine Frage zu Ihrem Angebot
template.s_description:
Hallo {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) hat Ihnen eine Nachricht zu Ihrem Angebot {ITEM_TITLE} geschickt:

{COMMENT}

Beste Grüße,

{WEB_LINK}

Hallo {USER_NAME},

bitte bestätigen Sie Ihre Registrierung mit Klick auf folgenden Link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Vielen Dank!

Beste Grüße,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You've successfully registered for {WEB_LINK}.

Thank you!

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: Schau, was ich auf {WEB_TITLE} entdeckt habe
template.s_description:
Hallo {FRIEND_NAME},

Ihr Freund {USER_NAME} möchte Ihnen dieses Angebot empfehlen {ITEM_TITLE}.

Nachricht:

{COMMENT}

Beste Grüße,

{WEB_TITLE}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Neue Angebote in the last hour
template.s_description:
Hallo {USER_NAME},

In der letzten Stunde wurden neue Angebote veröffentlicht. Schauen Sie sich diese hier an:

{ADS}

-------------

Um diese Benachrichtigung abzubestellen, klicken Sie bitte hier: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Neue Angebote in the last day
template.s_description:
Hallo {USER_NAME},

in den letzten 24 Stunden wurden neue Angebote veröffentlicht. Schauen Sie sich diese hier an:

{ADS}

-------------

Um diese Benachrichtigung abzubestellen, klicken Sie bitte hier: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Neue Angebote in the last week
template.s_description:
Hallo {USER_NAME},

es wurden neue Angebote in der letzten Woche veröffentlicht. Hier können Sie sich diese anschauen:

{ADS}

-------------

Um diese Benachrichtigung abzubestellen, klicken Sie bitte hier: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Hallo {USER_NAME},

Ein neues Angebot wurde veröffentlicht. Schau es Dir an!

{ADS}

-------------

Um diese Benachrichtigung abzubestellen, klicken Sie bitte hier: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Someone commented on the listing {ITEM_TITLE}.

Commenter: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Commenter's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, but you can still edit or delete the listing {ITEM_TITLE} for a short period of time.

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

If you register as a user, you will have full access to editing options.

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this email.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact email: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

You can edit this listing by clicking on the following link: {EDIT_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

We've sent you this e-mail because you've requested a password reminder. Follow this link to recover it: {PASSWORD_LINK}

The link will be deactivated in 24 hours.

If you didn't request a password reminder, please ignore this message. This request was made from IP {IP_ADDRESS} on {DATE_TIME}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Sie haben die Änderung Ihrer E-Mailadresse beantragt
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME}

You're receiving this e-mail because you requested an e-mail change. Please confirm this new e-mail address by clicking on the following validation link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Bitte bestätigen Sie Ihr Abonnement zu einer Benachrichtigung
template.s_description:
Hallo {USER_NAME},

Bitte bestätigen Sie das Abonnement für Ihre Benachrichtigung indem Sie auf folgenden Link klicken: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Vielen Dank!

Beste Grüße,

{WEB_LINK}

Hallo {COMMENT_AUTHOR},

Ihr Kommentar zu {ITEM_TITLE} wurde freigegeben.

Beste Grüße,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because you’ve published a listing at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this e-mail.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Even if you're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, you can still edit or delete your listing:

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Ein neuer Benutzer hat sich angemeldet
template.s_description:
Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a new user has been created at {WEB_LINK}.

User details:

Name: {USER_NAME}
E-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Jemand hat eine Frage an Sie
template.s_description:
Hallo {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) hat Ihnen eine Nachricht hinterlassen:

{COMMENT}

Beste Grüße,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Jemand hat einen Kommentar zu Ihrem Angebot hinterlassen
template.s_description:
There's a new comment on the listing: {ITEM_TITLE}.

Author: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Author's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

{WEB_LINK}

Sehr geehrte/r Herr/Frau {ADMIN_NAME},

Der Administrator von {WEB_LINK} hat ein Benutzerkonto für Sie angelegt:

  • Benutzername: {USERNAME}
  • Passwort: {PASSWORD}

Sie können das Admin-Panel hier aufrufen: {WEB_ADMIN_LINK}.

Vielen Dank!!

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,

Hallo {USER_NAME},

Ihre Anzeige {ITEM_TITLE} is dabei bald abzulaufen: {WEB_LINK}.
